pageContext.claim: “By the way, outside, if you want to go, we set up, for the first time, a tremendous movie screen, because we have thousands and thousands of people outside that couldn't get in. So we have a big screen and big loudspeakers, and I hope you're all happy out there.”
pageContext.analysis: There were no massive TV screens and no JumboTrons outside of the Trump rally in Tampa, according to the Tampa Bay Times, which reported that "hundreds outside did crane their necks, stand on tippy toes and listen through open doors."
